title: Set Data Model
description:
Describes the information for a set.
This model contains the properties of the set that will not change from print to print.

id.title: UUID (v5) of the Set generated by YGOJSON

nameAlt.title: Alternative name of the Set
nameAlt.description: Alternative name of the set for some special cases

setCode.title: Set code
setCode.description: Code that appears on the print to identify that it belongs to the set.

setCodeAlt.title: Alternative set code
setCodeAlt.description: Alternative set code for some special cases

printNumberPrefix.title: Prefix for the printNumber
printNumberPrefix.description:
Special editions and/or promotional cards have a prefix to indicate that they are not from the original set.
Note that for sub-sets (i.e., several decks on one set) also include a prefix on the printNumber but this doesn't identify the set

setInfo.title: Set Information Definition Model
setInfo.description:
Set information that can be localized.
This model does not contain localized data for constant values.

nameAlt.title: Alternative name of the set
nameAlt.description: Alternative name of the set for some special cases

setCode.title: Set code
setCode.description:
Code that appears on the print to identify that it belongs to the set.
Note that several products might have the same set assigned.
Also, some first-series set releases does not have a setCode assigned.

setCodeAlt.title: Alternative set code
setCodeAlt.description: Alternative set code for some special cases
